sentence.Network_en: The victim is willing and able to provide veridical testimony.
sentence.Network_cn: 受害者愿意并且能够真实地作证.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Vergilian 弗吉尔之诗的veridical 老实的veridically 不虚伪地
a. 不虚伪的,真实的,诚实的 unfeigned a. 虚构的,虚伪的,想像上的 fictive a. 不虚伪的,老实的,真实的 veridical a. 不真实的,虚伪的,不诚实的.

list.abs: ...种中性的、无害的归因[4]。 在这种基本思想指导下，形成了两种运用归因理论于治疗实践的模式：一种是“真归因疗法”（veridical attribution therapy）， 即：针对患者对其症状的不准确的归因，诱导其做出准确的归因 [医学教育网整理发布]。这种方法是以假.
veridical 老实的veridically 不虚伪地veriest 十足的
veridian 绿色颜料, veridic 说实话的, veridic 诚实的
多伯特基于这样的理论来批评胡塞尔的先验转向:惟有意识“触及”(hits)客体(object,对象)时,意识才会以一种正常的方式运作,特别是真实知觉(veridical perception)是.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin veridicus (from verus 'true' + dicere 'say') + -al

sentences.sentence: "perceptual error...has a surprising resemblance to veridical perception"- F.A.Olafson

auth_sentence.content: This is not the only veridical OBE verified by external data.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not the only veridical OBE verified by external data.

auth_sentence.content: Veridical hallucinations, OBE's, NDE's, many cases have been verified by objective means.
